titles.title: To amend the Federal Rules of Evidence with respect to the rule of privileges in civil cases.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E386)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration.

bill.summary: 3/9/1994--Introduced. Amends rule 501 of the Federal Rules of Evidence to provide that, in civil actions for deprivation of rights, the privilege of a witness, person, government, State, or political subdivision thereof shall be determined in accordance with State law.
